PHRASE.LANG: Ethnic clothing that has been dyed a brilliant blue and delicately embroidered with traditional patterns.\nThe light cape draped over the shoulders and light blue flower corsage wrapped around the waist add the finishing touches to this cute design. [#Legal]

Cette tenue ethnique teinte en bleu vif arbore des motifs traditionnels délicatement brodés.\nLa cape légère qu'on enroule autour des épaules et le bouquet de fleurs bleu clair ceignant la taille mettent la touche finale à cette jolie tenue. [#Legal]

Das Trachtengewand in leuchtendem Blau ist mit landestypischen zierlichen Mustern bestickt.\nDer leichte Schulterumhang und die hellblaue Blumencorsage, die um die Taille geschnürt wird, ergänzen dieses hübsche Ensemble. [#Legal]

Vestiti etnici tinti con un pigmento blu brillante e ricamati con motivi tradizionali.\nLa mantellina coprispalle e i decori floreali azzurri attorno alla vita sono i tocchi finali di questo grazioso completo. [#Legal]

El atuendo étnico está teñido en vivos tonos azules y delicadamente bordado con motivos tradicionales.\nLa ligera capa que cubre los hombros y el cinturón de flor azul ponen los toques finales a este bonito diseño. [#Legal]

Ethnic clothing that has been dyed a brilliant blue and delicately embroidered with traditional patterns.\nThe light cape draped over the shoulders and light blue flower corsage wrapped around the waist add the finishing touches to this cute design. [#Legal]
